
{{#.}}

# {{{section_name}}}

{{#entries}}

{{#.}}

## {{name}}

<h3>{{{title}}}</h3>

{{#description}}
<p class="rd-p">{{{description}}}</p>
{{/description}}

{{#usage}}
<h4>Usage</h4>
<pre class="r"><code>{{{usage}}}</code></pre>
{{/usage}}

{{#has_args}}
<h4>Arguments</h4>
<dl class="rd-dl">
{{#arguments}}
  <dt>{{name}}</dt>
  <dd class="rd-dd">{{{description}}}</dd>
{{/arguments}}
</dl>
{{/has_args}}

{{#sections}}
  <h4>{{title}}</h4>

  {{#contents}}
  <p class="rd-p">{{{.}}}</p>

  {{/contents}}

{{/sections}}

{{#examples}}

<h4>Examples</h4>
```{r {{{ id }}}, eval={{{ eval_example }}} }
{{{ examples }}}
```
{{/examples}}

{{#seealso}}
<h4>See also</h4>
{{{ seealso }}}
{{/seealso}}

{{#author}}
<h4>Author</h4>
{{{ author }}}
{{/author}}

{{/.}}
{{/entries}}

{{/.}}
